text: W Adams was the first manager of Shrewsbury Town F.C. He managed the club for seven years, between 1 May 1905 and 31 May 1912, during which period the club moved from Copthorne barracks ground to the Gay Meadow site. He was also manager during the then-record attendance for a Shrewsbury Town match of 5,000 against Wellington Town. == External links == * * W Adams at League Managers Association Category:Shrewsbury Town F.C. managers Category:20th-century deaths Category:19th-century births Category:English football managers
title: W. Adams
